GoForjHigh-trust Go libraries and tools, forged for developer productivity and performance

Explicit, ergonomic tooling for Go - designed to be readable, auditable, and production-ready.

Explore Libraries
Design Philosophy
üí†

Opinionated, never opaque

Explicit configuration, no hidden globals, and clear escape hatches. You always know what a tool is doing.

üß≠

Ergonomics without magic

Fluent APIs that reduce noise while preserving Go‚Äôs clarity, types, and explicit control.

üîÅ

Production-first behavior

Designed for real workloads: predictable errors, deterministic execution, and no surprising defaults.

‚ö°Ô∏è

Performance is intentional

Benchmarked, allocation-aware, and designed to scale. Performance tradeoffs are visible, not hidden.

üîç

Tested and documented by design

Runnable examples, high coverage, and docs that stay in sync with real code.

üõ†Ô∏è

Tools you can compose

Each library stands on its own, but shares consistent patterns and mental models across the ecosystem.

Coming soon ‚Äã

GoForj is focusing on releasing a focused set of high-quality libraries and tools over time. Each library is designed to be independently useful, with clear documentation, examples, and tests.

A guided project creation experience - including forj new - is in active development and will be introduced once it meets the same standards of clarity, explicitness, and trust as the rest of the ecosystem.

For now, explore the available libraries, run the examples, and use only the pieces you need.

Check back soon.
